meanings.sent1: She was desirous of a new toy.
meanings.sent2: The puppy looked desirous of a treat.
meanings.sent3: The cat gave a desirous stare at the fishbowl.
meanings.sent4: His desirous eyes lingered on the shiny object.
meanings.sent5: The child's desirous gaze fixed on the colorful balloons.

meanings.definition: Feeling a strong wish or longing
meanings.sent1: He felt desirous of a vacation to the beach.
meanings.sent2: The student was desirous of achieving good grades.
meanings.sent3: The desirous look on his face when he saw the ice cream truck was priceless.
meanings.sent4: Her desirous yearning for adventure led her to travel the world.
meanings.sent5: The desirous longing for success fueled his determination to work hard.
